member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.TestService.Service
member.summary: This class represents a test service for a data cache. It provides a getter and a setter method to access the data. The data are integer values provided by a randomizer which is always initiated with the same seed, so that the sequence of values is always the same in order to get comparable results.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.TestService.Service.randomizer
member.summary: Randomizer used to create random values as initial data.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.TestService.Service.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor. Calls a method to initialize the data of the service.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.TestService.Service.CreateValues
member.summary: This method creates new random values as service data.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.TestService.Service.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the random integer value for the given index.
member.param: The index of the wanted value. Has to be between 0 and 99.
member.returns: The random integer value for the given index.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.TestService.Service.Set(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set a new value at the given index.
member.param: The index of the new value. Has to be between 0 and 99.
